# Tools - Free Online Utilities
> A collection of free, privacy-focused online tools built with modern web technologies.

## About
Tools is a web application providing free utility tools that work entirely in your browser. No data is sent to servers - everything runs locally for maximum privacy and speed.

## Available Tools

### Music Tools
- **Metronome** (/metronome): A precise digital metronome for musicians. Features adjustable BPM (20-300), multiple time signatures, tap tempo, accent beats, and visual/audio feedback. Perfect for practice sessions.
- **Drum Machine** (/drum): A powerful drum pattern sequencer with 16-step patterns, multiple drum kits, MIDI import/export, and pattern saving. Create beats for practice or production.
- **Drum Synthesizer** (/drum-synth): A Web Audio-based drum sound synthesizer with detailed parameter control. Design custom drum sounds with oscillators, envelopes, and filters.

### Utility Tools
- **QR Code Generator** (/qr): Generate QR codes instantly. Supports text, URLs, vCards, WiFi credentials, and more. Customize colors, size, and download in multiple formats (PNG, SVG).

## Technical Details
- Built with Astro and React 19
- Progressive Web App (PWA) - works offline
- Fully responsive design
- Supports English and Korean languages
- WCAG 2.1 AA accessible

## API/Integration
This is a client-side only application with no public API. All tools work directly in the browser using Web Audio API and Canvas API.

## Usage Rights
All tools are free to use. The project is open source under MIT License.

## Contact
- Website: https://tools.soundbluemusic.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/soundbluemusic/tools
- Issues: https://github.com/soundbluemusic/tools/issues
